name: CoffeeBot
0:
”Alexa, ask coffee bot what type of coffee should i drink”
”I am having iced coffee”
”I am having hot coffee”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: coffee bot
des: When you have your first cup of coffee in the morning, what should it be? hot or iced? This skill takes the guess work out of it. Asking the skill, "What should I drink today", it will tell you want type of drink to have. You can also tell it which type of coffee you are having in order to better predict what you will have in the future.
